name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_5_CLAN_REGIONS_SIMULTANEOUSLY_OWNED
description: Your clan holds 5 provinces simultaneously on the multiplayer clan campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_CAPTURE_15_AVATAR_CAMPAIGN_REGIONS
description: Capture 15 provinces on the avatar campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_CAPTURE_ALL_AVATAR_CAMPAIGN_REGIONS
description: Capture all provinces on the avatar campaign map.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_EARN_20_CLAN_TOKENS
description: Personally earn 20 clan tokens.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_JOIN_A_CLAN
description: Join a multiplayer clan in Shogun 2.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_MAX_OUT_AVATAR_SKILLS_TREE
description: Spend the maximum number of points in your avatar's skill tree.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_VETERAN_UNIT_LEVEL_10
description: Through the avatar system, get a veteran unit to level 9.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_VETERAN_UNIT_LEVEL_5
description: Through the avatar system, get a veteran unit to level 4.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_4_ASHIGARU_UNITS_WHOLE_BATTLE
description: Keep at least 4 ashigaru units for a whole battle without routing once.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_ALL_UNITS_HIDDEN
description: Have all your army, except the general, hidden simultaneously for more than 30 seconds.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_BEAT_CA_STAFF_VIRAL
description: Defeat a Creative Assembly staff member in battle, or anyone else who has gained this achievement.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_FIELD_ENTIRELY_HEROES
description: Win a battle using an army composed entirely of hero units and your general.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_HOLD_ALL_KEY_BUILDINGS_2_MINS
description: On maps with more than one key building, your alliance shows its dominance by holding all of them simultaneously.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_PLAY_10_BATTLES
description: Play 10 multiplayer battles of any type.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_RALLY_5_UNITS
description: Successfully rally 5 units at once with one use of the general's rally ability.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_10_ATTACKING_SIEGES
description: Win 10 siege battles as the attacker.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_10_DEFENDING_SIEGES
description: Win 10 siege battles as the defender.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_100_RANKED_BATTLES
description: Win 100 matchmade battles in multiplayer.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_20_NAVAL_BATTLES
description: Win 20 naval battles in multiplayer.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_20_RANKED_BATTLES
description: Win 50 matchmade battles in multiplayer.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_200_MULTIPLAYER_BATTLES
description: Win 200 multiplayer battles of any type.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_25_LAND_BATTLES
description: Win 25 land battles.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_25_RANKED_BATTLES
description: Win 25 matchmade battles in multiplayer.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_BATTLE_50_PERCENT_MATCHLOCK
description: Win a multiplayer battle where more than 50% of your army is made up of matchlock units.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_BATTLE_EVERY_TYPE_OF_UNIT
description: Win a battle using an army composed of at least one of every class of unit (sword infantry, cavalry, archer, matchlock, spear, naginata).

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_BATTLE_NO_CAVALRY
description: Win a multiplayer battle using no cavalry units (excluding the general) in your army.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_BATTLE_NO_RANGED
description: Win a multiplayer battle using no ranged units in your army.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_BATTLE_NO_SPEAR
description: Win a multiplayer battle using no spear units in your army.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_BATTLE_ONNA_BUGEISHA_AS_GENERAL
description: Win a defensive siege battle with the lady of the house, the Onna Bushi, as your general. (Single Player Only)

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_MP_BATTLE
description: Win your first multiplayer battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIN_MP_BATTLE_LESS_THAN_15_PERCENT_LOSSES
description: Win a multiplayer battle losing less than 15% of your starting troops.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_WIPE_OUT_A_UNIT
description: Completely wipe out an enemy unit.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_BECOME_SHOGUN
description: Achieve the ultimate goal and become Shogun in the grand campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_CONTROL_KYUSHU
description: Control all the provinces on the island of Kyushu in the campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_CONTROL_SHIKOKU
description: Control all the provinces on the island of Shikoku in the campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_IGA_CLAN
description: Wipe out the Hattori clan in the campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_KILL_10000_ENEMY_SOLDIERS
description: Collect 10,000 heads of enemy soldiers.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_MAX_LEVEL_GENERAL
description: Obtain a maximum level general in the campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_MAX_LEVEL_METSUKE
description: Obtain a maximum level metsuke.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_MAX_LEVEL_MISSIONARY
description: Obtain a maximum level missionary.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_MAX_LEVEL_MONK
description: Obtain a maximum level monk.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_MAX_LEVEL_NINJA
description: Obtain a maximum level ninja in the campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_OBTAIN_100_FAME_IN_20_TURNS
description: Obtain 100 fame within 50 turns.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_OBTAIN_MAX_LEVEL_UNIT
description: Obtain a unit of maximum rank in the grand campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_POSESS_ALL_TRADE_NODES
description: Control all the trade posts on the campaign map at the same time.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_RESEARCH_EPIC_ARCHITECTURE_FIRST
description: Be the first clan in the campaign to master the art of epic architecture.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_RESEARCH_GUNPOWDER_TECH_FIRST
description: Be the first clan in the campaign to obtain gunpowder mastery.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_RESEARCH_SHIH_TECH_FIRST
description: Be the first clan in the campaign to master the art of Shih.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_SINK_CARAVEL_OR_NIHON_MARU
description: Sink a nanban trade ship or the flagship vessel the Nihon Maru during a naval battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_CAMPAIGN_AS_HOJO
description: Win a campaign as the Hojo clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_CAMPAIGN_AS_ODA
description: Win a campaign as the Oda clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_CAMPAIGN_AS_TAKEDA
description: Win a campaign as the Takeda clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_CAMPAIGN_AS_TOKUGAWA
description: Win a campaign as the Tokugawa clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_CHOSOKABE_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign as the Chosokabe clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_DATE_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign as the Date clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_EASY_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign on easy difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_GAME_AS_CHRISTIAN
description: Win a campaign as a Christian daimyo.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_HARD_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign on hard difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_MEDIUM_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign on normal difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_MORI_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign as the Mori clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_MP_COOP_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a multiplayer co-op campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_MP_VS_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a multiplayer head to head campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_MP_VS_CAMPAIGN_GIVING_OTHER_PLAYER_GOLD
description: Win a multiplayer head to head campaign despite giving the other player 10,000 koku.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_SHIMAZU_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign as the Shimazu clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_UESUGI_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign as the Uesugi clan.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIPE_OUT_IKKO_IKKI
description: Wipe out the Ikko-Ikki in the campaign.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_HARD_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign on very hard difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_RANK_1_SHOGUN_LADDER
description: Achieve the ultimate accolade and obtain rank 1 on the multiplayer Shogun Ladder.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_WIN_LEGENDARY_CAMPAIGN
description: Win a campaign on legendary difficulty.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_STEAM_SUMMER_SALE
description: Your daimyo wins 3 consecutive land battles during the summer season.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_MAX_POINTS_IN_BOSHIN_SKILLS_TREE
description: Max out any [Fall of the Samurai] avatar skill tree, by spending a skill point in each skill within a single skill tree.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_CREATE_SECOND_AVATAR
description: Create a second avatar for use in avatar conquest mode.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_DEFEAT_BOSHIN_ARMY_WITH_SHOGUN
description: Defeat a Fall of the Samurai army with a Shogun 2 army.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_A_DEFEAT_SHOGUN_ARMY_WITH_BOSHIN
description: Defeat a Shogun 2 army with a Fall of the Samurai army. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_TOBA_FUSHIMI_1
description: Chase down and rout an enemy unit as it tries to escape the Battle of Toba-Fushimi. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_TOBA_FUSHIMI_2
description: Play a historical battle. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_OSAKA_1
description: Win the Battle of Osaka after both bridges get blown up by the defenders. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_UENO_1
description: Win the Battle of Ueno without capturing any of the key temple buildings. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_AIZU_1
description: Win the Battle of Aizu after provoking all four hidden armies at once. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_MIYAKO_BAY_1
description: Complete the Battle of Miyako Bay with the Kotetsu having taken less than 25% damage. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_HAKODATE_1
description: Complete the Battle of Hakodate without any Imperial units being routed. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_HAKODATE_WON
description: Complete all historical battles. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_MIDWINTER
description: Win a defensive siege battle with your daimyo during any winter turn.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_GIFT_ARMY_OR_NAVY_IN_COOP
description: Gift your co-op partner an army or navy.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_INCITE_3_REBELLIONS_WITH_ISHIN_SHISHI
description: Playing as the Choshu, incite 3 rebellions in the same campaign using an ishin shishi. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_CONSTRUCT_3_TRADE_DISTRICTS_WITH_SATSUMA
description: Playing as the Satsuma, construct a trade district and trade with a foreign power within the same campaign. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_5_NAVAL_BOMBARDMENTS_WITH_TOSA
description: Playing as the Tosa, carry out 5 naval bombardments in the same campaign. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_3_ASSASSINATIONS_WITH_SHINSENGUMI
description: Playing as the Aizu, carry out 3 successful assassinations of generals in the same campaign using a shinsengumi. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_RESEARCH_8TH_TIER_TECH_WITH_NAGOKA
description: Playing as the Nagaoka, research any eighth tier technology. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_3_AMBUSH_BATTLES_WITH_JOZAI
description: Playing as the Jozai, win 3 ambush battles in the same campaign. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_BATTLE_WITH_AMERICAN_MARINES
description: Win a battle with United States Marines in your army. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_BATTLE_WITH_BRITISH_SHIPS
description: Win a battle with British ships in your navy. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_BOMBARDMENT_WITH_FRENCH_IRONCLAD
description: Carry out a bombardment with a French ironclad in your navy. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_ATTAIN_MAX_MODERNISATION
description: Attain the maximum level of clan development. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_CONNECT_A_RAILWAY
description: Construct a railway between 2 provinces. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_ATTAIN_MAX_LEVEL_ALL_AGENTS
description: Obtain a maximum level agent of each type. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_LEGENDARY_CAMPAIGN_IMPERIAL
description: Win a campaign on legendary difficulty playing as either the Satsuma, the Tosa or the Choshu. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_LEGENDARY_CAMPAIGN_SHOGUNATE
description: Win a campaign on legendary difficulty playing as either the Aizu, the Jozai or the Nagaoka. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_FIGHT_DROP_IN_BATTLE
description: Fight a drop-in battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_C_WIN_CAMPAIGN_AFTER_DECLARING_INDEPENDENCE
description: Declare your independence and complete a campaign. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_SINK_HMS_WARRIOR
description: Sink  an HMS Warrior-class ship. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_KILL_10000_MEN_WITH_ARTILLERY
description: Call in naval fire support during a land battle. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_SINK_ENEMY_SHIP_WITH_RAMMING
description: Sink an enemy ship by ramming. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_SINK_ENEMY_SHIP_WITH_TORPEDOES
description: Sink an enemy ship with torpedoes. [Fall of the Samurai only]

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_BURN_CASTLE_DOWN_AND_WIN_BATTLE
description: As the attacker, burn a castle's gates, towers and tenshu to the ground using fire arrows and win the battle.

name: ACHIEVEMENT_B_AS_DEFENDER_RECAPTURE_A_TOWER
description: As the defender, recapture a tower.
